recipes.title: Quinoa Upma
recipes.description: A fiber-rich breakfast made with quinoa and mixed veggies that helps in balancing blood sugar levels and keeps you full for longer.
instructions: Rinse quinoa under water and drain.
Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and curry leaves.
Add chopped onion and green chili, saut√© until soft.
Add mixed vegetables and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add quinoa, water, and salt. Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes until quinoa is fluffy.
Serve hot with yogurt or chutney.

recipes.title: Chia Seed Pudding
recipes.description: A nutritious dessert made with chia seeds, almond milk, cinnamon, and berries, rich in omega-3 and reduces inflammation.
instructions: In a jar, mix chia seeds, almond milk, cinnamon, and honey.
Stir well and refrigerate for at least 3 hours or overnight.
Stir again before serving and top with berries.

recipes.title: Spinach and Paneer Paratha
recipes.description: A healthy multigrain paratha filled with spinach and paneer, rich in iron and calcium, perfect for hormone regulation.
instructions: Mix wheat flour with water to form a dough and let it rest for 15 minutes.
In a bowl, mix paneer, spinach, and spices.
Roll out small dough balls, stuff with filling, and roll into parathas.
Cook on a hot pan with a little oil until golden brown.

recipes.title: Avocado and Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A protein-packed, anti-inflammatory salad with avocado, quinoa, chickpeas, and lemon dressing that helps in balancing hormones.
instructions: Mix cooked quinoa, avocado, chickpeas, and cherry tomatoes in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.
Toss well and serve fresh.
benefits: Rich in healthy fats and fiber

recipes.title: Moong Dal Chilla
recipes.description: A lentil pancake made with moong dal and spices, rich in plant-based protein and good for gut health.
instructions: Blend soaked moong dal with green chili, turmeric, cumin, and salt to form a batter.
Heat a pan, grease with oil, and spread the batter like a pancake.
Cook on both sides until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.
